metadata.title: CVE-2022-28948 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue in the Unmarshal function in Go-Yaml v3 causes the program tocrash when attempting to deserialize invalid input.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-28948` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-gopkg-yaml.v3-dev - 3.0.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: golang-gopkg-yaml.v3 package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.1-1').
snapd package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
